title: Greatest Common Factor
text: First, factor out the Greatest Common Factor of the expression.
speech: First, factor out the Greatest Common Factor of the expression.
pacedSpeech: First, factor out the Greatest Common Factor of the expression.

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: The greatest common factor (GCF) of polynomials is the largest polynomial that divides evenly into the polynomials.
speech: The greatest common factor (GCF) of polynomials is the largest polynomial that divides evenly into the polynomials.
pacedSpeech: The greatest common factor (GCF) of polynomials is the largest polynomial that divides evenly into the polynomials.

title: Greatest Common Factor
text: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the expression?
speech: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the expression?
pacedSpeech: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the expression?

title: GCF of coefficients
text: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the coefficients?
speech: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the coefficients?

title: GCF of $$x$$
text: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the variable $$x$$?
speech: What is the Greatest Common Factor of the variable  x ?

title: GCF of $$y$$

title: Finding the GCF
text: The greatest common factor of the expression is the product of the GCF of its coefficients and variables.
speech: The greatest common factor of the expression is the product of the GCF of its coefficients and variables.
pacedSpeech: The greatest common factor of the expression is the product of the GCF of its coefficients and variables.
